metadata.title: StudyHacks - AI Study Smarter
metadata.description: StudyHacks is an AI-powered study platform that transforms PDFs, videos, lectures into intelligent notes, flashcards, and quizzes. Study smarter with AI.
metadata.keywords: studyhacks, AI study smarter, study notes, flashcards, quiz generator, AI learning, study tools
